mapper.select: select tm.*,tl.equipment_location as patternName,tp.location_pattern as locationName from t_car_equipment_manage tm join t_car_equipment_location tl on tm.location_id = tl.location_id join t_car_equipment_pattern tp on tm.pattern_id = tp.pattern_id limit #{page},#{size}

select tm.id as id,tm.uid as uid,tm.community_id as communityId, tm.equipment_name as equipmentName,tm.equipment_number asinternetNumber, tm.internet_number as internetNumber, tm.pattern_id as patternId ,tm.location_id as locationId,tm.state as state, tm.create_time as createTime,tm.update_time as updateTime, tl.equipment_location as locationName, tp.location_pattern as patternName from t_car_equipment_manage tm left join t_car_equipment_pattern tp on tm.pattern_id = tp.pattern_id left join t_car_equipment_location tl on tm.location_id = tl.location_id where tm.community_id=#{query.communityId} limit #{page},#{size}
select count(*) from t_car_equipment_manage tm where tm.community_id=#{query.communityId}
